remarks: A sufficient condition for the derivative of a quotient to be continuous.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvdivcncf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvdivcncf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvdivcncf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
dvdivcncf.fdv $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D F ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
dvdivcncf.gdv $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D G ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
dvdivcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( F oF / G ) ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
